Detailed Description

A class for Todo Today Sheet graphical user interface object. Contains all the operations regarding the interaction among the final user and Todo Today Sheet object in the database. It has been implemented on the purpose but it grants a lot of elasticity for re-use thanks to QT libraries contribution. It exchange signals within itself in order to maintain an high average of consistency with the database; internal signals can also be intercepted from the outside the class in case it becomes necessary synchronization(i.e. multiple windows inquiring the database) This class depends on several libraries and external files such as the QtGui/QMainWindow and litesql libraries(i.e. the framework libraries used to access the sqlite database)
See also:
http://apps.sourceforge.net/trac/litesql/

http://doc.trolltech.com/4.5/index.html

void TodoTodaySheetGui::ChangeActivityPriority ( int  magnitude,
int  direction,
Activity &  activityToMove 
) [private]

Processes the change of priority once all prelimary controls are made. It is called from the SLOT assigned to the click of MoveActivityButton

Parameters:
magnitude a positive integer representing the number of position of the change
direction an integer representing the direction of the change (i.e. -1 upshift +1 downshift)
activityToMove a reference to an Activity obj representing the activity to move
See also:
on_MoveActivityButton_clicked()

void TodoTodaySheetGui::on_FinishActivityButton_clicked (  )  [private, slot]

Finishes the selected Activity by throwing it out of the Todo Today Sheet and setting the activity flag mIsFinished to true

void TodoTodaySheetGui::on_newActivityButton_clicked (  )  [private, slot]

Reads the input from ui::MoveMagnitudeBox and ui::MoveDirectionBox checks all the preliminary controls and then call the ChangeActivityPriority() function

void TodoTodaySheetGui::on_StartActivityButton_clicked (  )  [private, slot]

void TodoTodaySheetGui::PomodoroFinished (  )  [private, slot]

Handles the signal of PomodoroFinished() received from mpPomodoro sending an alert to the user and incrementing the activity attribute mNumPomodoro by one.
